bib.title: Liner2—a generic framework for named entity recognition
bib.author: Marci{\'n}czuk, Micha{\l} and Koco{\'n}, Jan and Oleksy, Marcin
bib.abstract: uses a subset of 82 categories and their list can be found in Liner2.5 model NER.3  To overcome this discrepancy we used the fine-grained model to recognize nation names and  The links were extracted from a Wikipedia dump using a Pyhon script called python-g419wikitools.5
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 6th Workshop on Balto-Slavic Natural Language Processing
